values:
I'm already 27 years old... how and when did I get this old. I wish I wasn't. I'm married to a great guy. Him and I have a different view on where we should be in our lives. I'm thinking we are almost too old to have kids, and he thinks it's too early. We have been together for almost seven years. I just think he's scared to get give up the relaxed party life. But what can I do. I'm just along for the ride. I've voiced how I feel and some how I end up a bad guy in the conversations ,so I chose not to say anything anymore. But, I get really bummed out when he doesn't want a family with me... what if I get too old then can't have them. I know people as young as thirty that it's happen to. Or what if we do later in life and the child is not 100% heathy when it's born. That's very common for women over Thirty-three...  Anyways that rant can continue but I'm not going to allow it.
I love my job at Teach N Fun. Two and half years ago my sister Jenny opened a second location and she has gave me the opportunity to run it. We have grown so fast, I love it!
Well, I check in another day, maybe another year :)

I love casey and magen! Somedays I might think about locking them in my dungen upstairs and letting them rot there for eternity. But ya know... no matter what it just take 5 minutes of being around them to remember why I truly do love them so much.

I went running for the past two days in hope to get the vacation body I want this summer, but ya know.. fuck this. It makes my legs feel like jello!

Right when you think life is good. And everything feels normal again.

You get stabbed in the face. 

I try to let my friends know I love them.

It's crazy, one day you wake up, have a wonderful day and then find out while you were  smoking and drinking the night before; someone you love was dying.

I hate death. I scares me to get close to anyone because they might die on me. I know it's part of life I'm just not very good at handling it.

What can you do? Nothing. Cry a little bit then go back to living. Im having a hard time with this. I don't know if I can fake being perky any more. I sometimes want to crawl in a cave and sort out my issues.  But theres alot of them....

Wow, Im still on this thing?!
The internet is amazing.

CASEY JO AND MEGGY WILL YOU MARRY ME?

I've become that girl. But I am so happy with my boyfriend it's unreal. Weird thing is he says he just as crazy for me. So far I have never once been mad at him, and he has never been mad at me. Weirdest part is we've been side by side at work and home for two months now and we still like each other. He's special...

I miss my girls. I don't want to sleep away from him, but I think he'll understand if I go out for the night. Unwritten Law is playing saturday, you should come with me.

love yous

Today he asked me to be his girlfriend.

This is a beautiful thing!

some crazy skin head is trying to kill me....

i got out of my ticket, still a perfect driving record...

school...passing...

sinlge...woo hoo...

love casey hamilton...

ONLY 7 MORE DAYS TILL I'M 21! YIKES!!!

Only 30 more days till my 21 st birthday......oh fuck.

I hate Daniel. I have a nice boyfriend but  I can't see myself getting close to him and we've been dating for two months....I dunno.

Schools alright.

Got my first speeding ticket, $207! Crazy huh?

Hate everyone this week, I wish I wasn't faking a smile 24/7.

I need to get crazy!

Have a good day!

I can't believe it my brother is getting married today!  My mom looked at me and said your my last!  I don't think she'll be paying for a wedding for me within the next few years. 

I drank a lot of beer in front of my family this weekend.  I think it made my daddy a little angry... oops!  My bad.  But I figure this is my vacation right?  so  I can drink relax get crazy and have fun.

I hate Iowa. It's cold. really really cold.  I've had a beenie gloves and scarf on since I flew it.

well I should probably get off my ass and get busy.  Wish my brother gary and my new sister in law amy the best of luck!

Casey and Meggy I miss you.

I haven't wrote in this thing for a while,

Let's see 
*still work at the same place but less hours :)
*still no boy friend :)
*school started and everything there is working out very nicely (thanks to the chair of the math dept.).
*My Megan started work today at her new job!!!
*My Casey Jo went to school on time for the first time since school has started, I am so proud of you!
*Casey Jo had a bithday on the 10th
*Oliver's birthday just past, Happy birthday to you both.
*I didn't get to take Casey Jo out :( But another day!!!
*Got to see some fucking awesome westsiders that I adore! I love you Mario Face! My little lady bug!
*Daniel says he loves and needs me, that kind of fucked up my head, but I am holding strong knowing it would never work.
*Got to smoke with the Marley Brothers in their hotel room before they went on stage at reggae fest :) Awesome.
*Love JPZ.

And that's my life in a nut shell....smile

I don't want to go to work today...  I don't know why, but I would really like to just stay home.

So this morning I am going to try something new.. not smoking.  I smoke too much. And I smoke by myself alot now :(  So I think I am going to work up to quitting.  I'll be healthier and save money.  But we'll see... I've had crazy ideas like this before.

Casey I miss you.

Megan you light up the dark moments in my life.


I hate love.  It ruins everything good in my life.

Megan you're funny-  go get a job! J/k

I love this house, ext  yesterday we were attacked.  It was awful.  I have like 18 battle sores... stupid ants.

going to work AGAIN!

I got home from work ysterday at 5 ish and fell asleep.
I woke up at 1:30 am and then watch American History X
Then went back to sleep till 11 am.

I was very very sleepy.  I love days off!
I don't have to go back to work till Friday at 4! woo hoo

megan and casey wake your ass up and play with me!

So I used to be one of those people who had a  plan..

I had a plan for everything!  But not anymore,  I am never a head or even caught up with anything.

Work is going good!  All my co workers are awesome!

I went to the river with my work last week.
I saw my manager yach!
It was my first time to the river, I had so much fucking fun, I ready to go again!!!

Sarah turned 21 this week,  watch out world... here comes one awesomely crazy girl.  (awesomely is a word).

I don't want to go to school.

I wish the voice in my head that tells me what's right from wrong; was right some of the time.


Shitty things have happens but can't let that bring us down. Life is fanntastic! Casey and I now live in the cutest house in Tempe!  AWESOME!


Stop by and smell the roses!

Where does all the time go?

Finals are so soon. I feel like I just took mid terms...

WHERE THE FUCK DOES ALL THE TIME GO?

Casey left the house! She left and went very far, I hope she comes home soon.


I have no smoke! Crisis!


I am scared for Elliot.



Megan you rock girl.

-I don't have plans with Elliot, I am coming home to hang out with you.

"I am going to Oliver's"

-I miss you, the house is creepy when I am alone.

well..  well... well...

I can not blame him.  But yikes!  I really like him but things are feeling a little rushed. It seems like Daniel and I just broke up  (really it was November 29 th).

Elliot is a very special person and I have lots of fun with him but I need some time to process everything he is telling me.

I hope he knows I don't plan on growing up for a long time; and I don't want anyone to fuck up my plans.


Tonight I am on cloud nine, literally.

On previous entries I may have mentioned wishing to be lesbian.  Well I figured it out, I am a lesbian. I am completely in love with women and have a sex drive for men.  If I could spend the rest of my life with Casey Jo.... I would.


Elliot is my boyfriend. He's... different.

Sometimes I want to give Elliot a chance,
other times I want to tell him to eat a dick.

He's sweet but somethings about him piss me off. 

I need a girls night.
Or a westsider night.
Or a drunken night.
Or something.


Today I wish I was a lesbian.

Saturday was fun! I love being around the girls, it makes me feel like I acually have girlfriends again!


All I want to do is sleep. This sucks. Last night I was sooooo sleepy. I was apaain out all over the place.  Todays the same way!  Ugghh..

My life rocks pretty hard.  I have the best roommmate ever!  I got to hang out with my girls! Money is good! The good times keep on comin'


Peace!

So girl, I know things seem really difficult in your life right now. But, I think you kind of make them that way.


Stop stressin', everything will fix it self! Everything will be just the way it's supposed to.  Don't worry.... Come hang out!


The new boy......I have no clue where this is going. We are hanging out today before work, I wish I knew what I wanted out of this. I think there's alot of things he doesn't like about me. I hope I don't fuck things up too bad with this one cuz he's alot of fun to be around,  lately he's been one of my only firends...


I wish I could live a "normal" life sometimes.  But don't get me wrong, most of the time I love life!!!


Smoke time.

I wish I could explain how cool I was when giving Daniel the "cut the string" talk.  I never cried once, and finally I got to tell him he's not perfect. God it felt good.

Daniel is not a bad person at all. But he does have this problem thinking everyone else is the only ones in the wrong.

school sucks.

I went to cancer camp, had an awesome time.

But I can never go again because if I leave Casey Jo home alone for a few days she starts to hate the world.

Oh Elliot.

what to know my secret?


I think Elliot is so cute!  It's been a while since I have wanted a guy.


HHHMMMmmmmmmmmmmm.


I am in a great mood. GREAT!

Being a working woman is hard.


I just want to sit on the couch.

Talk about a crazy week...



Worked full time at trails.

Had unwelcome visitors.

Pissed about 3 people off.


and soooo much more
I am getting nervous about school.

Disney Land was awesome. I had so much fun.

Little Casey Jo's face lit up at the sight of everything. I think she was the happiest lil girl there.

Hanging out with Daniel rocked. We hung out Saturday and Sunday, he didn't want the weekend to end....and either did I.  We just chilled and flirted like a first date.  I do love him. No matter all the mean and awful things I say; I love him.  He told me he still loves me. I just want to keep things like this for awhile. NO fighting- just fun.  We rock at having fun.

California Adventure was pretty cool. I must say, it is  no Disney Land. But definately a good time.

Megan...seeing you makes me so happy. Girl you belong here hanging out with us! We dlove you!

Tonight was...tonight was,... tonight was interesting. That is all I will say about that.

~Go to Cali.

~Go to Beach

~Explore LA

~Sleep

~Go to Disneylad

~Have an awesome time


It's my lil Casey Jo's first time to Disneyland!!!

what do you get if you take a bowl and memories of last night events?


about 8 hours of laughing.

Seeing lil Casey Jo at a bar drinking was wierd!

I love being with my girls. Sherry and Casey make me laugh so hard. And no megan is coming to hang out... I am so excited!


I love being happy!

with every grey day,
there will be ten days of sun shine!

Last year this time I was the happiest girl in the world! I loved life.

I went to lunch with my ex-boy friend and my girl Shanelle and her baby. I had fun at lunch. That baby is sooooo cute!

But now I am alone again. Like always...ALONE. I spent 6 months alone, but at least then someone loved me. I am sick of being alone. I don't want to turn around and get married. But I do want a reason to wake up in the mornings.  I want a reason to get excited. I want to have something to look forward to. I want someone who likes to be with me and accepts all my flaws.


put a gun in my mouth and pull the fucking trigger, I am not scared.

OK I know  my mom is ever so good to me, but lately she is pissing me off.  And now she wants me to go stay the weekend with her. WHY WOULD I DO THAT?


But I think I am going to have to because that seems to bethe only way she will be happy with me.



I hate to say it...but this weekend is going to suck!



Megan I LOVE YOU.

Casey... ya know.

Wow...Last night as crazy. Never left the apartment and it was so event full!

The night started to suck but, by the end of the night I would have to say I had an awesome time.


Thank you Casey and Peter... I love you guys.

Sherry is my big sister, I am supposed to worry her and stress her out, what the fuck?

Alright, Night has come....time to "party."


Smell you later Daniel....Smell you later forever!

Daniel, STOP making me cry.


Other wise than stupid Daniel making me cry, I had an awesome night.

Trees scares me.
People talking about money scares me.
Greed scares me.
Drugs scare me.
Love scares me.

But the carpet scared me tonight too, Happy Fucking New Year.

OK so I need to stop passing out so early cause then I wake up at the crack of dawn. I hate being awake.

Tonight is New Year's Eve and I am so not excited.  I really don't know what I am doing yet. I think we have plans but most likely we will end up sitting on the couch.


Everyone becareful the pigs are put tonight! And be safe, too many drunk drivers out there!


2004  is coming! A whole new year for a whole new me.

I have been going to bed super early then sleeping ing in!  I am soooo lazy, I need a job.

I am going back to lay down till Casey wakes up to play with me.  Hurry up douche

I have had so much fun lately! Nothing too much has changed, just now I don't have someone telling me how bad I am.  I think I am good person who likes to have fun.


No more sitting in the house all day! I am going to make lots of new friends and party when ever I want.


Goodbye Daniel, I love you. You set me free and now I am running full speed.

I just want to make out with him so bad. I know it's wrong so I will TRY to stay away. NO PROMISES!



So I think Daniel misses me but I can never really tell ya know.  I have decieded to party again because it makes me smile and he doesn't.


I am drunk and off to bed, pace out suckas

Merry Christmas to everyone and to everyone a good night.





this christmas SUCKED!


Casey Jo come home I am lonely!

I used to love Christmas!

Last night I should have been in church but instead I got really fucked up.

Today I should have woke up with my family and had breakfast, instead I woke up alone and will spend most of the day alone.

I need to little again!
XIcnblx: hi jackie i love you

I want to go on a date!

I don't know how this whole dating thing works but it has been forever since I have been on a date. I want to go to the movies... or ice skating... or dinner... or on a long drive... I want to go on a date with my Daniel but I need to get over that!  So MEGAN, take me on a date...


... hey baby for you I might put out.

I am so unhappy 
I missed Rancid!!!!!

I am so unpset! I want to die!

Daniel my heart hurts and it's all your fault.


THAT'S IT FROM HERE ON OUT I AM COLD HEARTED! FUCK MEN.

So I am not the drinker I used to be.

Last night was the first time I have gone out since "the break up" and I got so drunk so fast. Maybe I should just stop drinking all together... I know it would make my mom happy.


Daniel stayed over Thursday night.  He wants to act like were boyfriend-girlfriend with out the title. I don't know how I feel about that.

But I won't say anything cause I am Daniel's lil'bitch and will do whatever as long as I get to see him.

Still in love, wish I wasn't.
